text: Kamil Sebastian Durczok (6 March 1968 â€“ 16 November 2021) was a Polish journalist. He was an Editor-in-Chief and presenter of TVN newscast Fakty TVN. Durczok died on 16 November 2021 in Katowice, Poland from cardiac arrest at the age of 53. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Polish journalists Category:Television news anchors
title: Kamil Durczok
